pullrequest.title: Fuel: List models by owner on insert menu

content.raw:
Yeah I see what you're saying... And in any case we will need to have some sort of insert menu for local models (non-fuel).

But we should keep in mind that to have a nice browsing experience inside the native UI we will need to duplicate much of what we already have on the browser, i.e. pagination (very important), thumbnails, metadata, search, etc.
content.html:
Yeah I see what you're saying... And in any case we will need to have some sort of insert menu for local models (non-fuel).

But we should keep in mind that to have a nice browsing experience inside the native UI we will need to duplicate much of what we already have on the browser, i.e. pagination (very important), thumbnails, metadata, search, etc.
